name: Zero Car: Open World Extreme Racing
name_original: Zero Car: Open World Extreme Racing
description:
Zero Car is a very high quality 3D Open World Style Racing game.

Race, Drive, Jump, Change the Pain Color, Drift on Snow, Go Off-Road, crash into an airplane. Its all in this game.

Here's a bit more about the game:

--Three high detailed, interactive areas
--Off-Road, City, and Airport
--Over 50 Missions to Complete
--Racing Missions
--Parkour Missions
--Time Trial Missions
--All cars have Turbo Boost
--Includes Super Cars, SUV's, and some Muscle
--Massive 3D Maps
--Loops, Jumps, Bridges, Rocks
--Dirt Track, City Streets, Snow and Ice
--Huge Jumps and Super Long Drifts
--Aircraft are taking off and landing
--Helicopters are flying around
--Dynamic weather changes
--More the 20 different cars

If you find a better, more polished, more fun, open world style racing game out there please post to our Facebook page : https://www.facebook.com/gomotiongames. We would like to know.

Here are the answers to some questions I know you may have:

1. Why the Icon with a guy shouting? If you play the game to the end, and you don't make that face at some point, something might be wrong with you. This game is very challenging. If you do complete all the missions, that's REALLY impressive. You should be proud. Something I have not been able to do. Please please send me a screenshot or post it to twitter with #zerocar

2. Why are some cars secret and what are the secret cars? To make the game more interesting. Gigawatt is my favorite. Hint : "Where we're going, we don't need roads . . ."

3. The game does not work on my device, what do I do? You can adjust the settings to lower quality.

4. Why is the file size so huge? Because the game contains many graphic elements that require space.

5. Why do the cars have weird names? Because they do.

6. Do you like hobbies? Yes, do you?

The game looks better when you play it than it does in the video and the screenshot.

We would not recommend this game unless you have a relatively powerful device.

If you don't like the game, just delete it. Sorry for wasting your time.

We really hope you enjoy this 3D game. Its fast, fun, entertaining, frustrating, and really good. Making a game like this requires hard work, so please stop by and like our Facebook page and give us some feedback: https://www.facebook.com/gomotiongames or find us on twitter @gomotiongames.

I also provide a list of FAQ and hints on where to find the hidden packets. Enjoy!
